page.title: 18W.Lough.Disused Railway.
page.content: Behind my house there is a{Disused} {Railway Track.}The sleepers and metal rails have been taken away,so it is quite safe to play there.The over hanging trees make tunnels that shed a green light.It seems a secretive place and is ideal for making dens.My friends and I usually play around an old stone bridge.Sometimes we hide in the greenery and spy on people. The railway track is very well used by local dog owners and elderly people taking strolls.Most people think it is a very peaceful quiet area but occasionally the silence is shattered by roaring moterbikes using it as a racing track.Perhaps the only person who doesnt mind the noise is{The Ghost who haunts the nearby{White House}for she would be used to the rumbling of the trains.
